contents:
恕我直言，这事要让拜登来处理说不定不会发展到现在的局面。
拜登最近几天的发言：
“We are a nation in pain, but we must not allow this pain to destroy us. We are a nation enraged, but we cannot allow our rage to consume us. Please stay safe. Please take care of each other. ”
日常反对特朗普：“He's using the American military against the American people.
He tear-gassed peaceful protesters and fired rubber bullets.
For a photo.
For our children, for the very soul of our country, we must defeat him. But I mean it when I say this: we can only do it together.”
恕我直言这句话更能体现美国的价值。
“We are a country with an open wound.
None of us can turn away. None of us can be silent. None of us any longer can hear those words — “I can’t breathe” — and do nothing.
We must commit, as a nation, to pursue justice with every ounce of our being. ”
他基本上没有回避黑人的问题，川普则相反，他究竟对警察暴力的问题持什么态度根本没有什么表态，最近幾天美國的protest规模一直在扩大和他的反应不无关联。
